full_summary:
================================

### Government Tender Announcement for Repairs and Maintenance of Toxic Gas Monitoring Systems

#### Reference Number: WS4378552256

**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** 18 June 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** 28 June 2024 (14:00 EDT)
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 3 June 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** 31 March 2031

### Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer

**Procurement Category:** Services
**Method of Procurement:** Competitive – Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Financial Agreement Criteria:
The Government of Canada has made the following trade agreements available to bidders:

*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

### Region of Delivery:
The contract is to be carried out in Manitoba, Canada.

### Contracting Entity:
The contract is managed by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND).

#### End User:
The end-user of this contract is the Department of National Defence (DND), specifically the Real Property Operations Group (West) – Det Shilo, Shilo, Manitoba.

### Description:
This Standing Offer (SO) is for the provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision and materials for the inspections, repairs and maintenance of toxic gas monitoring systems at Real Property Operations Group (West) – Det Shilo, Shilo, Manitoba.

### Deliverables:
Deliverables for this contract will be detailed in future Commitments of Services, which will describe the required work to be completed.

### Security Requirements:
The successful bidder must adhere to specific security requirements associated with this contract.
